author: DollhouseCapers
title: A Sentimental Favourite
review:
This was one of my favourite sets from my childhood. I can't get enough of Scala Jewellery... mostly because of sentimental reasons... but also because it was nice to have Lego that didn't get mixed in with my brother's collection. As if he'd want to touch "girl's" Lego!

I did find that I had to ask Mum or Dad to clip the bracelet together around my wrist as it was always tricky to get the last two pieces to join together with only one hand.

As with all Scala sets, the box was great with the flip top and "mirror" on the inside, like a jewellery box.
